actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to require that the Secretary of Commerce treat the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State for the purpose of making surveys to furnish interim current data on subjects covered by censuses.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to treat the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State for the purpose of making surveys to furnish interim current data on subjects covered by censuses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to require that the Secretary of Commerce treat the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico as a State for the purpose of making surveys to furnish interim current data on subjects covered by censuses.
